name: Rhythm Doodle
description:
I finished my second LD.

It's a game of rhythm , moving your character with rhythm .And doodle all the squares black.
You can read the rules in the game.
I think the game is a little difficult . However, you can still open the hard mode after you completed all levels.

Tools: UE4 , Photoshop , GarageBand , sfxr .
